reference_summary:
American Originals
Various  (Actor),     History  (Director)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, A&E Home Video, All A&E Titles
["They're a special breed - guys who go to work in the morning never knowing if they'll make it home alive that night. Every day is a struggle just to survive. For the loggers, wedged on a mountainside with behemoth trees, 60-ton machines, and razor-sharp chainsaws, the slightest miscalculation can spell disaster. The ice road truckers, steering gigantic 16-wheelers over frozen roads, face the specter of crashing through the surface, frostbite, or worse. And residents of the forbidding, icy north battle weather and unforgiving terrain just to eke out an existence. They all need every bit of ingenuity, grit, and know-how they can muster just to stay alive at least until the next gig.This adrenaline-pumping collection from HISTORY includes over 20 hours of action from Ax Men, Tougher in Alaska, and the record-breaking series Ice Road Truckers. You'll be awed as you watch these ordinary-seeming men face the kind of daily challenges most of us can't even imagine.Programs per disc:DISC 1: Ice Road Truckers S1, Vol 1: episodes 1-4DISC 2: Ice Road Truckers S1, Vol 2: episodes 5-8DISC 3: Ice Road Truckers S1, Vol 3: episodes 9-10 / bonus materialsDISC 4: Ice Road Truckers: On and Off The IceDISC 5: Dangerous Missions: Suicide Missions of D-Day / Marine Raiders / Forward Observers / PathfindersDISC 6: Dangerous Missions: Rescue Swimmers / Merrill's Marauders / Assault on Iwo Jima / Hostage NegotiatorsDISC 7: Ax Men S1, Vol 1: Man vs. Mountain / Risk and Reward / Storm Season Strikes / The Big HitDISC 8: Ax Men S1, Vol 2: Market Meltdown / Reversal of Fortune / The Close Call / Loggers Under FireDISC 9: Ax Men S1, Vol 3: A Logger's Thanksgiving / Black Friday / Storm of the CenturyDISC 10: Ax Men S1, Vol 4: The Toughest Season / Picking Up The Pieces / The Final HaulDISC 11: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 1: Episodes 1-4DISC 12: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 2: Episodes 5-7DISC 13: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 3: Episodes 8-10DISC 14: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 4: Episodes 11-13"]
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 5.75 x 2.25 inches; 1.5 Pounds', 'Director': 'History', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '37 hours and 36 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 26, 2009', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Language': 'Unqualified (DTS ES 6.1)', 'Studio': 'A&E Home Video', 'Number of discs': '14'}
The shows work great and liked the value package to see other shows I haven't.  I got it to see Ax men and Ice road truckers but think its great to see the other shows too.
American Original dvd package
Smokey and the Bandit (The 7-Movie Outlaw Collection)
Burt Reynolds  (Actor),     Sally Field  (Actor),     Hal Needham  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Comedy
["Strap yourself in for hours of high-speed high jinks and jaw-dropping fun as Smokey and The Bandit: The 7-Movie Outlaw Collection puts you in the driver's seat of the rowdiest road-movie franchise of all time. With the three original movies that turned Burt Reynolds and CB radios into national obsessions and the four television movies that spread Bandit mania to a whole new generation, this seven-movie, four-disc collection puts every legendary performer, every outrageous stunt, every dadgum catchphrase in the whole Bandit universe into one place—yours!", 'Bonus Content:', 'Disc 1 - Smokey and the Bandit:', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Disc 1 - Smokey and the Bandit II:', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Disc 2 - Smokey and the Bandit Part 3:', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', ']]>']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user maintains a strong affinity for documentaries and reality TV, particularly those focused on extreme professions and survival challenges. Their interests have expanded to include classic comedies and action films, showcasing an appreciation for engaging storytelling and nostalgic cinema. Recently, the user has shown a growing inclination towards narratives that intertwine humor with meaningful themes, especially those centered around personal struggles and faith, valuing uplifting messages about resilience.

In their latest interaction, the user rated a show highly for its suspenseful and engaging plot, indicating a preference for content that keeps them guessing while remaining interesting. This aligns with their ongoing appreciation for high-energy, adrenaline-filled narratives. They continue to favor comprehensive collections that offer extended viewing experiences, highlighting their commitment to quality and depth across various entertainment categories.

Keywords reflecting their evolving preferences include:

- Documentaries
- Reality TV
- Extreme occupations
- Survival challenges
- Classic movies
- Engaging storytelling
- High-energy action
- Comedic and inspirational films
- Suspenseful and interesting plots
- Value packages
- Diverse content

Overall, the user enjoys a diverse mix of high-stakes reality, inspirational themes, and humorous escapades, valuing quality and entertainment in their media choices while constantly evolving their interests.
